author: markt
msg: Add a warning comment and simplify the code a little.

author: markt
msg: Refactor the remove list in the Poller to be a close list. The poller
now removes the socket if it is in the Poller then destroys it. Note the
socket is always destroyed whether it is found in the Poller or not.

author: markt
msg: Move the point where the socket is removed from the connections Map so
all the actions apart from removal from the Poller are in a single
method to facilitate refactoring removal of the socket from the Poller.
